PHRASE.LANG: カリカリに焼けた豚バラ肉の上に、ソースとマヨネーズと青海苔をたっぷりとかけた、ホカホカのお好み焼き。[#Legal]
A Japanese savory pancake containing crispy strips of fried pork belly topped with a sweet Worcestershire-like sauce, mayonnaise and sprinklings of dried green seaweed.[#Legal]
Un savoureux pan cake japonais contenant des lamelles croustillantes de porc frit rempli au-dessus par une douce sauce Worcester, de la mayonnaise et saupoudré d'algues vertes séchées.[#Legal]
Ein herzhafter japanischer Pfannkuchen mit knusprigen Bacon, einer süßlichen braunen Soße und etwas getrocknetem Seetang.[#Legal]
Crespella giapponese con croccanti fette di addome di maiale fritto e ricoperta da salsa, maionese e alghe secche sparse a completare il tutto.[#Legal]
Una sabrosa torta japonesa que contiene crujientes cintas de tripa de cerdo frita cubiertas de una dulce salsa Worcestershire, mayonesa y trocitos de alga verde seca.[#Legal]
바짝 구운 삽겹살 위에 소스와 마요네즈와 파래김을 듬뿍 뿌린 따끈따끈한 오코노미야키. [#Legal]
Piping hot okonomiyaki on crispy fried pork rib meat, covered in mayonnaise, sauce and green laver.[#Legal]
在煎得香脆的豬五花肉上淋上滿滿的醬料和美乃滋並撒上海苔粉、熱呼呼的大阪燒。[#Legal]
在煎得香脆的豬五花肉上淋上滿滿的醬料和美乃滋並撒上海苔粉、熱呼呼的大阪燒。[#Legal]
A Japanese savory pancake containing crispy strips of fried pork belly topped with a sweet Worcestershire-like sauce, mayonnaise and sprinklings of dried green seaweed.[#Legal]
